sen.j: 内容はそれまでの戒律を基に、仏教教団としては異例の自給自足体制を確立させた禅宗教団に適合するような、主に集団生活を適正に維持するための規則である。
sen.e: Based on the preceding religious precepts, it was established principally as the rules to keep the group life properly, which were suitable for the Zen sect organization that established the self-sufficiency system - exceptional for a Buddhist organization.

sen.e: Regrettably, this Baizhang's shingi, called "Hyakujo Shingi" (The Regulations of Baizhang), was scattered and lost, but its fragments were compiled again into "Hyakujo Koshingi," and this is handed down to us today.
